title: Guidance For Editors
leading: Are you writing documentation? You are awesome! This guide is for you. It covers editing functionality and options in Strapi content management system.

content.leading: This documentation site is powered by Strapi. It is a content management system (a.k.a. CMS). All the content, images and illustrations you see on this site come from the CMS.
content.title: Get Started with Strapi
Strapi User Guide
content.description: This user guide explains all features available in the admin panel of your Strapi CMS.

content.title: MADS Content Panel
